name: kiwix_js_windows
productName: Kiwix JS for Windows Electron Edition

scripts.package-win: electron-packager . kiwix-js-windows --overwrite --asar --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=www/img/icons/kiwix-64.ico --prune=true --out=bld/electron --version-string.CompanyName=Kiwix --version-string.FileDescription='Kiwix JS ZIM File Reader' --version-string.ProductName='Kiwix JS for Windows Electron Edition'

author: GitHub
